name: Peaches and Cream Breakfast Rice
author: thedailygourmet
summary: Our area has been hit with crazy winter weather, and I created this to give a hint of cozy summer comfort.
ingredients: ½ cup white rice, rinsed and drained
directions: Combine water, peaches, rice, peach preserves, vanilla bean paste, and salt in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, for 15 minutes, then release remaining pressure using the quick-release method
Melt coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir until pecans are toasted, 2 to 3 minutes
Stir pecan mixture into the rice
Divide mixture into 4 serving bowls and top each bowl with 1 tablespoon cream
